name: User Control Panel (LS-V)
header: Control panel for a multiplayer game.
text: UCP that let's you, manage your characters for a GTA-V mutliplayer game. Register / Login, email confirmations , update information, view your account activity, and more. Contact me for source code.

name: Family Overseer
text: Register and Login, create groups and invite your family members, maintain a list of tasks, allowing members to create, edit, complete and delete tasks as they desire.

name: Portfolio
text: A static, single page, website to showcase my skills and projects. Using Bootstrap 4 for design, jQuery and clipboard.js

name: BlizzardApiReader
text: An Open source github project. serve as an interface for Blizzard Public games API. OAuth implementation, Fluent API, and Dependency Injection to Improve TDD aspects.
